Entries.Phone_Ring_MaruCaughtCheatingEvent: Dad was right about you.$a#$b#I wish I had listened. *click* $s

Entries.Phone_Ring_PennyCaughtCheatingEvent: Well, I guess I'll try to forget this ever happened.$s#$b#But I really liked you. *click* $s

Entries.Phone_Ring_EmilyCaughtCheatingEvent: Maybe I should have given Clint a chance. *click* $s

Entries.Phone_Ring_LeahCaughtCheatingEvent: Just so you know, you're no different than Kel!$a#$b#Never talk to me again! *slam* $8

Entries.Phone_Ring_AbigailNotCaughtCheatingEvent: Is something going on with you?$2#$b#Because you've been acting a little strange lately. *click* $3

Maru Not Caught Cheating Incoming Call

Entries.Phone_Ring_MaruNotCaughtCheatingEvent: You know, Harvey's been saying some strange things about you at the clinic.$s#$b#That he noticed you with someone.$s#$b#I hope I don't have any reason to worry.$s#$b#But you know, you can tell me anything. *click* $s

Changes.LogName: Haley Not Caught Cheating Phone Conditions
Haley Not Caught Cheating Incoming Call

Entries.Phone_Ring_HaleyNotCaughtCheatingEvent: You're not hiding anything are you?$3#$b#Because my sister's been acting a little weird lately. *click* $a

Penny Not Caught Cheating Incoming Call

Entries.Phone_Ring_PennyNotCaughtCheatingEvent: Is everything okay?$s#$b#My mother's been saying some really concerning things about you lately.$s#$b#If there's anything you want to talk about, I'll always listen. *click* $s

Changes.LogName: Emily Not Caught Cheating Phone Conditions
Emily Not Caught Cheating Incoming Call

Entries.Phone_Ring_EmilyNotCaughtCheatingEvent: You know, I'm really glad I can trust you.#$b#I just needed to get that out there. *click* $h

Changes.LogName: Leah Not Caught Cheating Phone Conditions
Leah Not Caught Cheating Incoming Call

Entries.Phone_Ring_LeahNotCaughtCheatingEvent: You know, I got a really cryptic message on my computer last night.$8#$b#Something about you cheating on me?$8#$b#But I think it was just from Kel.$8#$b#He's always trying to come between us. *click* $8

Entries.Phone_Ring_Abigail2HeartEvent: I'm kind of surprised that a farmer like you has the time to play video games with me.#$b#You know, you're not so bad, @.#$b#Hey, maybe next time we can play Jumino Cart.$h#$b#Well, my game just loaded, so gotta go! *click* $h

Entries.Phone_Ring_Abigail4HeartEvent: You kind of surprised me when you showed up when I was playing my flute.#$b#I go up to the mountains to practice where it's quiet.#$b#But, I wouldn't mind letting you listen next time.$l#$b#Ugh! My mom needs the phone, so I gotta go. Bye! *click* $a

Entries.Phone_Ring_Abigail6HeartEvent: I guess I looked pretty dumb in the the graveyard, huh?$s#$b#It's just that my parents don't get me.$a#$b#Adventure's calling me.$3#$b#Do you ever get that feeling?#$b#Anyway, I'm glad you showed up when you did.$h#$b#Oh, crap! I just died! I'm gonna have to repeat this level.$7#$b#Gotta go! *click* $a

Entries.Phone_Ring_Abigail8HeartEvent: Hey, @! You know, I had a lot of fun contacting spirits with you.$h#$b#Do you think we really got through?$3#$b#Oh well, maybe next time.$s#$b#Ugh, I gotta go. My parents are arguing.$a#$b#Something about a secret stash. See ya. *click* $a

Entries.Phone_Ring_Abigail10HeartEvent: Hey, @! Just wanted to call to say thanks again for saving me in the mine.$h#$b#You're so brave. Maybe next time, you'll take me with you.$l#$b#Well, I gotta go. Have a great day, and come see me when you've got a chance. *click* $l

Entries.Phone_Ring_Maru2HeartEvent: Hey, Dad admitted to me what he said to you, and I just wanted to call to apologize.$s#$b#But, he means well. He just wants what's best for me. You understand, right?$4#$b#Well, I gotta go to work, so I'll see you later. *click*

Entries.Phone_Ring_Maru4HeartEvent: Hey, I wanted to call to thank you for taking up for me with Dr. Harvey.#$b#I don't know why, but I've been a little clumsy lately.$2#$b#But I'm going to be more careful from now on.$1#$b#Well, I better get back to work. Have a good day! *click* $1

Entries.Phone_Ring_Maru6HeartEvent: Hey, I wanted to call to tell you I really enjoyed looking at the planet with you the other night.$h#$b#Did you know there's a comet coming soon, and the mountain will have a perfect line of sight for viewing it?#$b#Gotta plan ahead for these things, right?$l#$b#Well, I better go. Have a great day! *click* $h

Entries.Phone_Ring_Maru8HeartEvent: Hey, I wanted to call to see if your burn is any better?$2#$b#I am so sorry again! I seem to be having to apologize a lot lately.$2#$b#Well, I better get back to work, but keep applying that burn cream. Have a great day! *click* $1

Entries.Phone_Ring_Maru10HeartEvent: Hey, you'll never believe it, but I've been nominated for an award with the Space and Science Museum in Zuzu City!$h#$b#I could have never finished MarILDA without your support!$l#$b#I'm so excited! I just can't believe how smart she is!$9#$b#Well, I better go rehearse my speech. I'm so nervous!$9#$b#Come by and see me later today if you get a chance. Okay, bye! *click* $1

Entries.Phone_Ring_Haley2HeartEvent: You know, next time you come over, you need to knock first instead of barging in on someone's private conversation.$a#$b#That might work with Emily, but I live here too, you know. *click* $a

Entries.Phone_Ring_Haley4HeartEvent: @, hey can you swing by later today? I've got another jar that needs opening.$13#$b#You're so strong.$13#$b#Emily! Stay out of my room! Ugh, I gotta go.$a#$b#Okay, thanks! You're the best! *click* $h

Entries.Phone_Ring_Haley6HeartEvent: Hey @! Thank you so much again for finding my great-grandmother's bracelet!$h#$b#It means so much to me that you found it.$11#$b#You know, people around here don't normally go out of their way to help others.$s#$b#You do. I like that.$l#$b#Well, gotta go! Thanks again! *click* $13

Entries.Phone_Ring_Haley8HeartEvent: It was so embarrassing that you saw me fall off that cow!$l#$b#But I had fun taking pictures with you.$h#$b#Marnie asked me to come back, so she can teach me how they give milk.$11#$b#Can you imagine me? On a farm?$12#$b#But these cows are being so stubborn! *splash*$12#$b#Eww!!! Daisy!$9#$b#Now, I've got to get another shower, so I better go! *click* $10

Entries.Phone_Ring_Haley10HeartEvent: Good morning, @! I'm really glad I got a chance to finally show you my dark room!$11#$b#You know, it's funny. It started as a little hobby of mine, but now, everywhere I look, I find myself snapping pictures$h#$b#Hey, do you think it would be okay if I came over a little later and took a few photos of the wildlife on your farm?$13#$b#Really? You're the best!$11#$b#Well, I've got more photos to develop so I've gotta go.#$b#Have a great day! I miss you! *click* $13

Entries.Phone_Ring_Emily2HeartEvent: Guess what? I had the craziest dream.#$b#Next time you're at the saloon, I'll tell you all about it.#$b#Well, I gotta get to work. See ya! *click* $h

Entries.Phone_Ring_Emily4HeartEvent: Guess what? I really think that parrot that flew in came from Ginger Island.#$b#If you haven't been out there, it's beautiful.$h#$b#Well, I'm just going to get him patched up and send him on his way when he is better.#$b#Thanks for your help! Gotta go! *click* $h

Entries.Phone_Ring_Emily6HeartEvent: Please don't tell anyone about my secret hobby!$6#$b#I know you won't.$l#$b#I just don't want my sister to find out.$s#$b#She already thinks I'm silly.$s#$b#Well, I've got to get to work. Wish me luck! Bye! *click* $h

Entries.Phone_Ring_Emily8HeartEvent: Wasn't the fashion makeover so fun?$h#$b#But, I don't really think Clint got into it.$s#$b#Do you have any idea why?$2#$b#Oh well, you can't please everybody. But thanks for being so supportive.$h#$b#Now, what to design for you. My wheels are already turning!$h#$b#I gotta go draw this out before it flies out of my mind! Talk to you soon! *click* $h

Entries.Phone_Ring_Emily10HeartEvent: Heehee! Wasn't our camping trip so fun?$h#$b#Not to mention cozy.$l#$b#You know, maybe I should thank that bear for bringing us closer together.$l#$b#Heehee! Now where should we go next?$h#$b#Let me know what you think, so I can ask Gus for some time off.#$b# Gotta go! Miss you already! *click* $l

Entries.Phone_Ring_Penny2HeartEvent: Good morning, @. I just wanted to call to apologize for putting you in an awkward situation with Mr. George.$s#$b#I should have respected his desire for independence, and you really helped me see it from his perspective.$3#$b#I really want to be a good role model to my students.#$b#Well, I won't keep you. Have a nice day. *click*

Entries.Phone_Ring_Penny4HeartEvent: Hey, I can't really talk right now, but I wrote you a letter explaining things a little better.$s#$b#Well, I gotta go to work. Bye. *click* $s

Entries.Phone_Ring_Penny6HeartEvent: Hey, @. I really enjoyed us cooking together.#$b#Mom didn't seem to like my new recipe though, but I think she ruined her taste buds a long time ago.$s#$b#Oh well, maybe next time, I could come over, and we can cook at your house.$l#$b#Well, I've gotta go. Bye. *click* $h

Entries.Phone_Ring_Penny8HeartEvent: Hey, @. Thank you so much for talking to my students about your experiences as a farmer.$h#$b#They really seemed to like it.#$b#Lately, I've been thinking about what it would be like to live on a farm.$l#$b#But, I know that will never happen.$s#$b#But, I have really come to enjoy our friendship.$h#$b#It is really nice to have someone to talk to besides children.$3#$b#Anyway, I won't keep you. Have a good day. *click* $h

Entries.Phone_Ring_Penny10HeartEvent: Good morning, @. I had so much fun with you at the pool.$h#$b#I hope you would like to go again with me sometime soon.#$b#I have to admit, I was terrified of sharing my feelings with you, but you always seem to put me at ease.$l#$b#I hope you don't mind joining me at the bathhouse again some time.$l#$b#Well, I have to get ready for work. Time always seems to fly when I am with you, but it has become a snail when we are apart.$s#$b#Have a great day! Love you! *click* $h

Entries.Phone_Ring_Leah2HeartEvent: Hi, this is Leah.#$b#I just wanted to say thank you for stopping by.$3#$b#I have never shown anyone my work before, so I wasn't sure how you'd respond to it, but I appreciate your encouragement.$s#$b#Anyway, if you want to come by again, I can show you some of my other work.$h#$b#Well, I need to finish working on this sculpture before the clay hardens. Bye. *click* $6

Entries.Phone_Ring_Leah4HeartEvent: Hi, I just wanted to call to apologize for staying on the phone with Kel while you were here.$s#$b#I didn't mean to get you in the middle of it. But thank you for being so understanding.$s#$b#I just wish he'd leave me alone.$8#$b#Well, I'll talk to you later. Bye. *click* $s

Entries.Phone_Ring_Leah6aHeartEvent: Good morning. I hope I wasn't too forward in giving that sculpture to you.$l#$b#After I got home, I just couldn't help but wonder about it.$s#$b#Well, I'm not sorry I gave it to you.$3#$b#I just didn't want to be presumptuous. But, you have given me so many ideas that I can't wait to capture them all.$l#$b#Thanks for that. Well, have a good day. *click* $h

Entries.Phone_Ring_Leah6bHeartEvent: Good morning. I just wanted to say thank you for helping me out in the forest.#$b#It was a little embarrassing. But I guess, I'm starting to not feel as embarrassed when I'm with you.$l#$b#I'm even starting to get up the courage to show my art in public.#$b#And it's all thanks to you. Well have a great day! *click* $h

Entries.Phone_Ring_Leah8aHeartEvent: Good morning. I just wanted to thank you for all your support!#$b#I had so much fun at the art show. And guess what? The Zuzuopolis Art Museum in Zuzu City has asked me to host an exhibit!$h#$b#I'm so nervous. Maybe you wouldn't mind accompanying me to set it up.$l#$b#Anyway, I won't keep you, but thank you again for everything! *click* $h

Entries.Phone_Ring_Leah8bHeartEvent: Ugh! I'm thinking of closing down this website because I'm really starting to think my ex is using my success to stalk me!$8#$b#Yeah, you're right. I can't let him continue to get the better of me. Otherwise he's winning.$s#$b#You know, you always seem to know the right thing to say.$l#$b#Well, I won't keep you, but I may call again if I run in to problems with him.$s#$b#Come see me when you have a chance. See you soon. *click* $l

Entries.Phone_Ring_Leah10HeartEvent: Good morning, @. I'm sorry that my ex always seems to interfere with our time together.$s#$b#I just don't know what to do to get him to leave us alone.$s#$b#You know, I moved out here to get away from him, but he followed me.$5#$b#But being with you has helped me to become more bold and put myself out there.$h#$b#And for the first time, I feel safe.$3#$b#Because I know I have you there to catch me when I fall.$l#$b#Have a great day, @! I love you. *click* $l
